title: Britain's banks to support firms hit by Carillion
text:
Britain's banks to support firms hit by Carillion 9:05pm IST - 01:23 
Britain's biggest banks have announced a range of measures to support firms and contractors hit by the collapse of construction outsourcing company Carillion, amid continuing questions over who among its personnel will get paid. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain's biggest banks have announced a range of measures to support firms and contractors hit by the collapse of construction outsourcing company Carillion, amid continuing questions over who among its personnel will get paid.
